name: Roboquest
summary: Roboquest is a fast FPS Roguelite in a scorched futureworld. You're a rebooted Guardian, ready to kick some metal ass! Fight with your buddy or by yourself and annihilate hordes of deadly bots in ever-changing environments.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2020-08-20(Early Access)
  • 官方网站: http://www.roboquest.com/
  • 开发: RyseUp Studios
  • 发行: RyseUp Studios
